title: issue with In-Game Settings
body: I'm having an issue with my screen resolution, and LoL settings when I start a game. Every time I get in a game my League starts off as windowed, window/resolution is painfully small, FPS is randomly locked at 25, and the settings are the lowest. Consequently, I have to readjust my settings every time I enter a game. I reinstall League but I still get the issue. Any advice?

replies.body: This could be due to a few reasons like outdated drivers, or corrupt configuration files that are failing to save or load properly.  As a first step, I recommend updating your drivers to get this fixed up.  Our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide will provide some instructions on getting that taken care of!  You will also see some additional steps there like repairing your game files, which can fix up messed up corrupt files/folders!  Hope that helps!
